mapper.select: select * from payment_record where order_no = #{orderNo} order by create_time desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into payment_record(order_no, payment_no, user_id, amount, payment_method, payment_status, transaction_id, create_time, pay_time, callback_time, callback_content, refund_amount, refund_time, refund_reason) values (#{orderNo}, #{paymentNo}, #{userId}, #{amount}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentStatus}, #{transactionId}, #{createTime}, #{payTime}, #{callbackTime}, #{callbackContent}, #{refundAmount}, #{refundTime}, #{refundReason})
mapper.update: update payment_record set order_no = #{orderNo}, payment_no = #{paymentNo}, user_id = #{userId}, amount = #{amount}, payment_method = #{paymentMethod}, payment_status = #{paymentStatus}, transaction_id = #{transactionId}, pay_time = #{payTime}, callback_time = #{callbackTime}, callback_content = #{callbackContent}, refund_amount = #{refundAmount}, refund_time = #{refundTime}, refund_reason = #{refundReason} where id = #{id}
